meta.description: Maximize the number of virus tests administered at a popup clinic using spit tests and swabs.

sets.name: TEST_TYPES
sets.description: Types of tests administered at the clinic.

params.name: time_per_test
params.description: Time in minutes required to administer each type of test.

params.name: total_time
params.description: Total available time in minutes for administering tests.

vars.name: num_tests
vars.description: Number of tests administered for each type.

objective.name: max_total_tests
objective.description: Maximize the total number of tests administered.

constraints.name: time_constraint
constraints.description: Total time for administering tests must not exceed available time.

constraints.name: accuracy_constraint
constraints.description: At least twice as many spit tests as swabs should be administered.

constraints.name: minimum_swabs_constraint
constraints.description: At least 20 swabs must be administered.
